channel.title: JBoss Issue Tracker
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [WFLY-4941] WFLYCLEJBINF0005: Failed to cancel[schedule] expiration/passivation of bean UnknownSessionID on primary owner.: ExecutionException: TimeoutException: timeout sending message
item.description:
Seen in our failover tests - this warning message is present in each server log in each test we have run so far.

When each server in cluster is restarting after failover, other servers get CacheTopology change (the starting server is added) and the servers log this warning message many times:
(for http session tests, the error identificator is WFLYCL*WEB*INF0005 rather than WFLYCL*EJB*INF0005)

[JBossINF] [0m[0m11:32:27,681 INFO  [org.infinispan.CLUSTER] (remote-thread--p5-t12) ISPN000336: Finished cluster-wide rebalance for cache dist, topology id = 10
 
[JBossINF] [0m[0m11:32:27,809 INFO  [org.infinispan.CLUSTER] (remote-thread--p6-t2) ISPN000310: Starting cluster-wide rebalance for cache clusterbench-ee7.ear/clusterbench-ee7-ejb.jar, topology CacheTopology{id=10, rebalanceId=5, currentCH=DefaultConsistentHash{ns=80, owners = (3)[perf19: 26+28, perf20: 27+26, perf21: 27+26]}, pendingCH=DefaultConsistentHash{ns=80, owners = (4)[perf19: 20+20, perf20: 20+20, perf21: 20+20, perf18: 20+20]}, unionCH=null, actualMembers=[perf19, perf20, perf21, perf18]}
 
[JBossINF] [0m[0m11:32:28,347 INFO  [org.infinispan.CLUSTER] (remote-thread--p6-t6) ISPN000336: Finished cluster-wide rebalance for cache clusterbench-ee7.ear/clusterbench-ee7-ejb.jar, topology id = 10
 
[JBossINF] [0m[33m11:32:28,624 WARN  [org.wildfly.clustering.ejb.infinispan] (EJB default - 4) WFLYCLEJBINF0005: Failed to cancel expiration/passivation of bean UnknownSessionID [6855655451695655554868505252524957485470656956657048536848556569] on primary owner.: java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException: timeout sending message to perf18

item.summary: WFLYCLEJBINF0005: Failed to cancel[schedule] expiration/passivation of bean UnknownSessionID on primary owner.: ExecutionException: TimeoutException: timeout sending message

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Also, we're seeing the same WARN with a SuspectedException as a cause:

[JBossINF] �[0m�[33m02:46:09,667 WARN  [org.wildfly.clustering.web.infinispan] (default task-4) WFLYCLWEBINF0005: Failed to cancel expiration/passivation of session lnWNNuRoQ8MbAEY-mfFxPOLql2_xD4YoMjbwaifO on primary owner.: java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: SuspectedException

Server log: https://jenkins.mw.lab.eng.bos.redhat.com/hudson/job/eap-7x-failover-http-session-undeploy-repl-async-shared-sessions/3/console-perf19/

I assume that this is very similar, so I'm just adding a comment here.
Also, we're seeing the "opposite" situation too: Failed to schedule expiration/passivation ...
These WARN messages do not indicate a bug. Situations like this are expected during jvmkill tests.
Is this also expected with shutdown and undeploy failure types? Comments above indicate that this happens for these failure types as well.
Paul Ferraro can you please respond to Ladislav's comment?
I am seeing this too more frequently than i would expect when testing shutdown locally. This is pending investigation but my guess is that this will need fixing.

Actually, regarding

Also, we're seeing the same WARN with a SuspectedException as a cause:
[JBossINF] �[0m�[33m02:46:09,667 WARN [org.wildfly.clustering.web.infinispan] (default task-4) WFLYCLWEBINF0005: Failed to cancel expiration/passivation of session lnWNNuRoQ8MbAEY-mfFxPOLql2_xD4YoMjbwaifO on primary owner.: java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: SuspectedException

we should be retrying on suspect. Let me check that.

On a clustering call 19/02/2016 we decided that this exception is harmless so we will just lower this onto debug logging level. Also, we decided to keep the retrying invoker configured as is as to not increase the delaying. The related WFLY-6128 to be closed as rejected, see description on the Jira.
